Netmaker — WireGuard Mesh

What it is: A platform to create and manage secure, peer-to-peer WireGuard networks for exercise infrastructure and team devices.

Features

  • Secure peer-to-peer connectivity.
  • Token-based network enrollment.
  • Subnet routing for advanced setups.
